name: BubbleChatConfiguration
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Allows for customization of text chat bubbles through Class.TextChatService.
description: |
  Allows for customization of text chat bubbles through Class.TextChatService.
  See Bubble Chat for implementation details.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - TextChatConfigurations
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: BubbleChatConfiguration.AdorneeName
    summary: |
      Body part or Class.Attachment that bubbles will attach to.
    description: |
      String name of the body part or Class.Attachment that bubbles attach to;
      if multiple instances of the same name exist, the system attaches to the
      first instance found. Default is "HumanoidRootPart".
    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Behavior
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: BubbleChatConfiguration.BackgroundColor3
    summary: |
      Background color of bubbles.
    description: |
      Datatype.Color3 background color of bubbles. Default is
      Datatype.Color3|Color3.fromRGB(250, 250, 250).
    codesamples: []
    type: Color3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: BubbleChatConfiguration.BackgroundTransparency
    summary: |
      Determines the background transparency of the default bubble chat as a
      number between 0 and 1.
    description: |
      Determines the background transparency of the default bubble chat as a
      number between 0 and 1. This value is multiplied with the user's
      Class.GuiService.PreferredTransparency to create the effective
      background transparency used by the bubble chat, which may be more opaque
      than this value set here. Default value is 0.1.
    codesamples: []
    type: double
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: BubbleChatConfiguration.BubbleDuration
    summary: |
      Time before a bubble fades out, in seconds.
    description: |
      Time before a bubble fades out, in seconds. Default is 30.
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Behavior
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: BubbleChatConfiguration.BubblesSpacing
    summary: |
      Vertical space between stacked bubbles, in pixels.

      Vertical space between stacked bubbles, in pixels. Default is 6.

    deprecationmessage: ''

      canload: true

    capabilities:

    type: boolean

    summary: |

      Maximum number of text chat bubbles shown per user. If the number of
